channel.title: Mob on Lewis Coleman
channel.description: Recent content in Mob on Lewis Coleman

item.title: Day 62 - The Business Stage
item.description: The Business stage Today kinda marked the beginning of the “Business” stage of the Apprenticeship Programme. This is where I learn ab out HolidayCheck as a business and explore and discover what all the different departments and product teams are doing, but also to get to know everyone better. So every week I shall move my desk to a new team and work with them for a week, I will mainly still be doing my own personal learning but participate in team activities where possible.
